name: Lilly
review: Easy to use.

name: Mommy V
review: Finally a glitter eyeshadow that makes your eyes sparkle and beautiful! I use them everyday whether I'm going out or going to work. There is not a lot of eyeshadows that have glitter in them. I am soooo obsessed!

name: rocklassic
review: This is like glue. It does not apply well or blend well what so ever. It was also so tacky that the eyelids stuck together.

name: rocklassic
review: This was like colored glue. It did not apply easily, nor blend well at all. Then, it was so sticky that the eyelids stuck together.

name: Kayla72685
review: Very smooth. Feels a little thick or heavy on the lids

name: Kay
review: It took forever to blend down not to look like you were going on stage

name: Kathreen
review: Looks nice for just couple hours after that it looks horrible

name: Malinda
review: I cannot believe that I'm just discovering these and that's only because of the buy 2 get 1 Ulta was running on Revlon products that caused me to browse. I bought 3 different colors, Green Glimmer(more like a turquoise), Lilac Luster, and Burnished Bling. I loved them all so much that I just ordered Dessert Dazzle today from another site when I came across it. I read many mixed reviews about the application and the finished look of this product and I have figured all the negative reviews come from improper application, because I had NO problem with the application process and all 3 colors have turned out amazing on me. I love the eyeshadow part.. It's pigmented smooth looking, and dried quickly. I'm very careful not to apply it above my crease though or it will crack/crease. I only apply it the outer 3/4 of my eyelid than apply a lighter shade to the inner corner and do the rest of my eye makeup as usual. I do have to put a light cover of regular shadow on top so that it blends in with my crease color. I love the glitter part just as much. I'll usually apply a layer right above my normal black eyeliner. I do half away across my eye then dip  it back in to finish other half and that makes sure I get good and even pigmentation and glitter across entire eye. I'll also put a line of the glitter right in the outer half of my crease line (like a cut crease) sometimes to make my eyes pop more if I use a darker color for my crease. Just gotta make sure to keep eyes closed for a minute for it to dry. I really am already addicted to this product... It brings such a beautiful look to my eyes and has  drawn many compliments. My fiancee loves the way it looks! My mission is to own all of the colors within the month!

name: Kee
review: Highly pigmented and works good for everyday use

name: Jazlyn
review: I really recommend this product it is amazing

name: Diamondgirlbmw
review: Can be very creative with this product

name: Diamondgirlbmw
review: Love to blend these eyeshadow and accent inner corner with sparkling liner

name: None
review: Peeled off my face after an hour

name: Nandee
review: Love it

name: Charity
review: Great for easy every day or glitterly prom looks. Very versatile!

name: Me
review: I like it, last for hours.

name: Dee
review: Love it alot.

name: MJ
review: I was so excited to try this, and it looks amazing on, but immediately started burning my eyelids. I tried to wait it out to see if it would stop, but it didn't. Luckily, it came off with a wipe and the burning stopped. Bummer because the color and sparkle is fantastic.

name: DetroitGal
review: I LOVE this cream eye shadow! I am talking about the Lilac color. The sparkly color is TOO sparkly and looks like I'm a "working girl".  The Lilac color is Amazing! It is the perfect shade of purple. I get complements ALL THE TIME. I wear it everyday for work.  The color lasts my whole 12-hour shift and does not come off nor smudge until I take it off. It dries very quickly so it does not blend well, but it doesn't bleed or move once you apply it.

name: ccarter
review: I like this product and it is long lasting. I use it on my lids because I have hooded eyes and anything shimmery normally transfers. this stays put! Having said that, this products takes FOREVER to dry down. FOR-EV-ER!!!! You put the color on, it takes 3-5 min, you put the glitter on, it takes 5+ min. Not to mention you have to do each eye separately so you are not closing both eyes at once. We are talking 15+ minutes for eyelids. I use this rarely because it takes so long to put on. I wish it would dry more quickly because I would use it all the time. It's just not that user friendly. I would go with Maybelline Color Tattoo, which dries instantly. I would recommend this with caution!

name: Happy
review: it was hard to use and it flaked off and got in my eyes

name: Tinker
review: It's easy to use and cheap.

name: melindajoy926
review: Applies easily. Use wand to apply cream shadow, let dry...use tip brush to apply glitter goop, let dry. I found it creased and peeled on my inner eye corner, so I just apply shimmer shadow to my inner eye crease, but everywhere else it holds! I love the color options. It's not super glittery, but still sparkly enough for day or night use.

name: kar
review: Hard to find a purple I like and this was great.

name: Christina in Boston
review: Depending on the color you select and on your personal preferences, this product can be used for when you want to feel more glam or for a dressier day at work or out, especially since you can choose whether or not to use the glitter liner.  The cream base is highly pigmented with no transparency and dries to a satiny metallic. There is no shimmer or glitter in the base, only a metallic shine, which makes it versatile. Once you apply it, it will not budge! I swatched this on my hand initially and it was still there at the end of the day. Keep this in mind when applying! For those not accustomed to applying glitter liner or applying liner with a brush, it may take a little bit of you getting used to, but these color combinations are gorgeous and if you are hesitant about going all out with the look, you can try just lining from the outer corner to mid-lid. Enjoy experimenting!

name: Megan
review: This product does not adhere well to the skin. The sparkly glitter end is great though and worth the money. :)

name: sandhi
review: I have this product in a different color; I loved it; but after a while the main color was very sticky on my eyelid. I got a new one, and it was the same. I do have fun playing with the color combinations!

name: Susie
review: Awesome Coverage, i Love it!

name: jamie
review: Takes a few minutes to dry, once it does it stays in place.

name: Carrie
review: I haven't worn cream shadows in years because even the upscale brands would crease. Smashbox now makes one that is good and I was going to splurge on that until a friend recommended this.  I tried it, expecting not to be impressed, but I was wrong.  It stayed on all day, no creases, even when outside in the makeup-melting heat & humidity. The glitter stayed on also.  I was able to remove it all easily with some eyeshadow remover.

name: Sheree
review: I really like the colors but its in a gel form and the glitter is very hard to come off!

name: Sammy J.
review: The color is really pretty and gives a very light, but sparkle touch to eyes. I would definitely recommend this!

name: Kary
review: I use this product everyday. I work in the beauty industry and everyone is always asking me where I get my glitter shimmers from.

name: Angie's fun
review: This product was quick and easy to use.

name: Flower Child
review:
The concept for this product (cream eyeshadow with matching glitter that helps one avoid using messy loose glitter, I think) is a great one, but the product itself falls a little short. It is surprisingly long-lasting and crease resitant, though I did put the eyeshadow over a primer so I am not sure how it would do without that. The color is absolutely brilliant (I bought the "Green Glimmer" one which is actually more of a teal color), and while I think it would be great for going out, I wore it to work and received compliments. The glitter is not messy, and I have used it as liner and on my eyelashes. As liner, it needs a little dry time or it will smudge, and as mascara it its thick when worn over regular mascara.
The real problem is that both the glitter and eyeshadow are sticky until dry, and they both, especially the eyeshadow, take a bit to dry. The eyeshadow is also difficult to blend, but I suspect it would be much easier to blend with another creme eyeshadow than the compacted powder eyeshadow I used.
All in all, it is a good product, just a little difficult to work with.

name: xo_diana08
review: I absolutely love this product. I want to buy every single one of them. I get so many compliments when I wear it. The glitter is liquid and dries so no messy glitter all over your face.

name: Sarah the Stripper
review: I love the beautiful green color that lasts and lasts, and I get lots of compliments.  But it does not blend. At all. I have to apply dark brown and some black to blend it.

name: Ashleigh
review: I love the pigment! Wish it didn't crease and dry like it does though

name: BleuIvySagarius
review: Nice wand applicator

name: CK
review: Great product in several colors.

name: Ss
review: Great lasts long and easy to apply

name: breanna
review:
this is my favorite cream eyeshadow, the glitter is okay but not the best.
I'm a cheerleader so I am constantly having to reapply my makeup in the 90 degree weather but this DOES NOT BUDGE.
Perfect!! (steel spark is my favorite)

name: Rabz
review: I really like both ends. The metallic liquid can be used all over the lid for a really quick glam look. If you have hooded lids like me then just don't take it too close to the crease otherwise it will spread when you blink. It doesn't dry right away so you have time to work with it. The glitter works well on top of the metallic and can be used alone also. I haven't tried either as an eye liner yet.

name: Cactus
review: I use this for colorguard performances. Very bold, and pigmented. Easy to use. Better wear with a primer underneath.

name: Jo
review: It builds up increases of eyes if you don't let dry all the way and that takes a while

name: Glitter Dud
review: This product applied nicely and looked perfect for the look I was going for but within 30 minutes the glitter peeled off like snake skin. Very disappointing.

name: 1000cranes
review: The glitter was very chunky and hard to apply. The applicator for the glitter and the shimmer shadow was very big. It was hard to accurately place the glitter. I bought this to make a cool glitter line on top of my eyeliner. This is definitely not the right product for this endeavor. I returned it.

name: Plain Jane Turned Makeup Addict
review: I had been wanting to try this for a while. Finally bought the Green Glimmer one and the gold one. It stung my eyelids! Also, it just doesn't really stay put even when I use primer before-hand. I didn't care for how it looked either. Looked and felt like I was putting nail polish on my eyelids. I think I'll stick to powder eye shadows.

name: Just me, Yolonda
review: The pigment was all that I was looking for; plus... I loved the over all look. The product was very wet and creased if I didn't wait for it to dry all of the way. Drying time was a bit long but well worth the wait.

name: Helena
review: This eyeshadow is easy to apply, and it lasts forever! I fell asleep with it on and it still looked as good as when I first put it on. I also have a bad habit of rubbing my eyes, but this stayed on every time!

name: Shell
review: I love new thing and I love sparkly things. The color is great. My biggest complaint is when it dries it pulls your skin so bad that it is uncomfortable. Definitely don't use as a liner. Only use on the lid. And you will still have glitter on you days later because glitter is impossible to get rid of.

name: Nakia
review: It was highly pigmented but hard to blend. I wore it to homecoming and it held up well but after about 8 hours of wear it completely wore off

name: KSmith
review: I really like this!! Only change would be the applicator to create a smaller line for the liner.

name: Jade 305
review: So pretty n dramatic

name: Lena V
review: Gorgeous!! Long lasting with just enough glitter. Very beautiful

name: Allovertheface
review: I have this product in the green and purple. The green eye shadow part is not bad. The glitter part is horrible though. The glitter is in some sort of gel form. After applying my eyes felt stuck together. And it all flaked off all over the place. The purple one lacks pigment and it applies way more clear than it should. I have a similar product from a completely different brand and i really like it a lot. These Revlon eye shadows are a disappointment. The glitter is a sticky mess. Both parts never did dry down completely either.

name: Romantic wife
review: This product is AWESOME.!!

name: Sierrah
review: I love these!!! I bought lots of colors. They go on smooth and give the perfect sparkle to my inner corner. They are perfect and long lasting. I did a review on them on my YouTube channel- simply Sierrah tutorials

name: Vane
review: Love the color

name: Lexii
review: Loved it! This was the first glitter I've ever used and I'm in love! It was easy and blends well. A little messy to take off but honestly I would keep buying these products. I used it for just a normal glam out and about look, but pair it with some bold lipstick and you're all set for the night out.

name: CubanMay
review: Stay on

name: muddy
review: loved the color

name: Jamievarnum79
review: Love this eye shadow cream!! It has very beautiful colors, very glittery, which I LOVE! Only downside, is it's very dry, after application!

name: Kells
review: This applies like my child's glitter glue, but quickly dries so that when you move (try to continue applying makeup), it cracks/ cakes up and starts to flake up. Its horrible! Don't waste your money!

name: Melissa
review: Good color

name: Carmiegirl
review: Very easy to apply and lasts all day/night. Gives a slight sparkle to your lids, but it's not over-the-top. I usually use it for night, but it's just as nice for day also. Goes on smooth and needs no blending. Great for the extra pizzaz.

name: Beth
review: The color and everything about the product is awesome.

name: Jax
review: I love the intense colors but when I used the glitter on lids it cracked & peeled. Otherwise I love the product!

name: Celeste the FX artist
review: While this is a very easy to use product and has a wonderful pop of glam to your look, it tends to be stiff and flakes off after a few hours.

name: Angie
review: The product is too heavy. When I wore it, I had to make an extra effort to keep my eyes open!

name: Shay
review: I have tried to figure a way to use it but it drys way to quick and the glitter flakes off

name: Rosie
review: I'm a cocktail waitress so I use lots of make up, I was very excited about the colors of this products so I bought one... By the time I got to work my eyeshadow had cracked and I had to peel and scrape it off of my lids... NOT recommended

name: LaJonnie
review: Love the color. However I found it applied unevenly and felt heavy on the lid. Plus it took a long time to dry.

name: Makeup collector
review: I really had a hard time getting the liquid shadow to blend...it was terrible.  i took the product back for a refund... not worth my money.

name: Girl with green eyes
review: I use this product as a base and by itself. The glitter is amazing the application is amazing! You will not be upset with this product! Pigmention is great! It dries on your lid, so it lasts pretty long. The only thing I did not like about it, it dries too quickly if U want to use it as a base and its a little complicated to remove.

name: MauiBaby
review: The colors looked great.  The product does not apply well,  once dry it flakes off.

name: Ceecrys
review: I love how easy it was to apply! Very long lasting.

name: Harmony
review: This is awesome! Add cheaper than most products with the same job

name: FaintDuchess
review: Liner is a little sticky, but overall a good buy

name: Christina the manager
review: Beautiful colors, but it creases bad. The glitter goes beautiful with other shadows but is hard to take off and the cream shadow crease really bad

name: Ash
review: I love how the green and the food look but I think to green is to dark

name: Heather Hills, harpist
review: I have worn this only once so far to try it out. I bought it for performances and other special occasions when I need high-impact color and a little glitz. In spite of my fair skin, I have difficulty finding eye shadow that shows up and stays put without collecting in the crease. I love how easily it paints on. It has a very smooth and shimmery finish even before you add the glitter. I also love that you can choose how much glitter to apply so you don't have to look like a fairy if you don't want to. I used a line of glitter above my lashes like eyeliner, and it had a beautiful effect. I have so far worn the peach prism color alone. I also purchased lilac luster but have not tried it yet. I do not see how it would be possible to blend this creamy paint-on eye shadow, but I am no expert. There may be a technique I just don't know. Do be careful with placement: since this paints on, it can have a bit of a hard edge, so it is important to be precise. Nonetheless, I love the product.

name: Klaire
review: This product applied on my eyelids well, but soon after it started cracking and peeling off. This happened every time I used it, so it's really a waste of money.

name: Jay
review: This product is amazing! There are two sides one shimmering metallic and theother is the glitter.  The glitter is sososo bold but you can put just a little for subtle effects or more layers for bold WOWZA effects! the shimmer is also great for everday shine ( also use as hihglight is you want) but yeha aMaZiNg!! i am also quite picky on my shimmer products or any product in general

name: N/A
review: Good

name: Audrey
review: These creme shadows are amazing! They dry down pretty quickly, so blending is almost impossible but they are crazy pigmented and do. not. move. I swear you can rub them as hard as you can and they don't move on your eyelid. They remove easily with makeup remover or wipes but they are so long lasting, it's hard to believe they're drugstore. And the glitter is amazing, too! The more gold glitters are much better than the darker colors, but all the glitters are also budge-proof. Seriously worth every penny!

name: Nunu
review: Love this combo..stays on forever...so cool

name: Kindra
review: Would buy it again!

name: Lynn
review: I like the sparkle it brings to my eyes.

name: Liz
review: Used this for a dance recital and it worked perfectly!

name: Natasha
review: this is beautiful and I was so excited but it's not worth the money. as it dries up your eyelids tighten up and start to wrinkle up and then after like an hr it starts to fall off. the glue starts to peel off

name: Donna
review: I have used it to add some variety to my style.

name: Cat
review: Onstage/ work

name: Simple Style
review: I am glad I bought this on sale and not full price, I have been eyeing up this product for a while, I got it in the rose/gold/bronze color. The cream eye shadow is easy to apply, but it doesn't stay on and you can feel it on your eyes even after it dries. The glitter liner is too gloopy and you have to apply too many coats to get the full glitter effect. Would not buy again.

name: Alma
review: I like it

name: D....
review: I returned the product ...

name: Abbbbs Nunez
review: I am really satisfied with this product!! I would definitely go back and buy the other colors. I Love how the glitter stands out and dries fast it doesn't smear or crease. PLUS it lasted me ALL day and still looked flawless by the end of the night!!!!

name: AZMomma
review: I bought this product for the glitter half and I felt after layers and layers of applying, it just took forever to dry and the glitter payoff just didn't amaze me. The metallic side is great! Once it dries you cant put anything over it because it starts to flake, but it was very pigmented. I actually returned mine and I have been using the Urban Decay Metal Liners instead. Soooo worth the extra money!

name: LawLawLand
review: My teenage daughter and I both LOVED this eye shadow for a fun night out!  It goes on super easy and stays forever.  The color is bright and fun.

name: Shauni
review: It's great beacuse you can use both edns (sparkles and base color) together or separate and either way it still looks great

name: Kristina
review: It is really thing when u apply, makes eyelid feel really heavy. Peels off that's how thing even when u dab color on. When u apply the glitter it burns like crazy

name: Kelly S
review: Amazing product, easy to apply, great color! Perfect for spring/summertime!

name: Stylish over 50
review: Love it!!!

name: Lexi
review: I love this product because you can use the eyeliner side as a shadow as well to get a very glittery effect

name: pris
review: I don't like

name: Nunu
review: So fun to apply and wear...lasts a long time on eyes

name: Tai
review: Great product overall long lasting and goes on super easy

name: 7eno
review: Great for evening look

name: NCC
review: I have been on the hunt for a glitter shadow and I came across this shadow used by a MUA I found on instagram and she revealed that this was a Revlon product, so naturally I went out and bought it and was pleasantly surprised.

name: Love2Shop
review: It takes awhile for the first coat to dry completely and then you can apply the second liner over the shadow. I like it because it was inexpensive and something new to try. Love the gold tone colors and they're so much fun to play with.

name: Becky
review: The pigmented side goes on super great, but the glitter side is a little more iffy.

name: Edllz
review: I don't like that it takes long to dry. And after it dries it clumps up.

name: Jayjay
review: I absolutely love this product, it so easy to use and it looks fantastic!

name: Mo
review: Love the rich color ! Great for a base eyeshadow too ! Will buy more

name: jen
review: This is such a great product wish they would come out with more colors like a rose gold would be perfect.. I already own all colors and when I use them I always get so many compliments recommend it for the holidays especially

name: Brandi
review: I was disappointed in this product. After it dried it clumped and cracked. I felt like I had glue on my eyelids.

name: Pryscilla and her Sparkles
review: I have 3 of these. The turquoise gold and smiley silver . They apply very easily and dry pretty quick. The only downfall is they tend to get a little stiff and will crack a tiny bit .

name: Bam
review: The shadow goes on great and looks amazing. The liner is difficult. The glitter is cute but difficult to apply on smoothly. Good price.

name: PB
review: The glitter did not come out enough. Brush really thin.

name: makeup geek
review: It doesn't last long at all, it clumps, flakes, and smudges every were. When is dries I feels like when Elmer's glue dries on your skin. The only good thing about it is the smooth application. And don't even get me started on the glitter.

name: Victoria doll
review: I love how it sparkles I used it for my lid and got so many complements only thing I would say is its time consuming you have to wait for it to dry but it's so worth it

name: Theresa
review: Love it

name: M
review:
Purchased Color 090 Burnished Bling.
Use over another shadow to give it bang! The sparkly side is phenomenal. Have used over Ulta's Miss Fabulous eye shadow palette color "Sugar Bear", which is a soft shimmer taupy brown. Or use as eyeliner
This is really more for evening IMO. And for young users-a mature lid that is soft and with some wrinkles would be tugging and would feel heavy
Some glitter sparkle can trickle down the end of the eyes.
Stays put. Use sensitive skin miscellar water to remove

name: Tb
review: I have lilac luster & I like it. I used my finger with the cream shadow to blend it. I like the glitter but it does take longer to dry than my nyx crystal liner. Be sure to apply the glitter with a smooth layer on the lid or it can clump up and flake. I made that mistake on one eye and the other was smooth and stayed put.

name: BeautyEnthusiast23
review: I don't use the glitter as an eyeliner - I actually use it as a shadow when I do a cut crease.  It's amazing!

name: Kristina
review: i bought this for its glitter part mostly, but I liked the color too. it takes long time dry, smudges and creases. It felt heavy on my lids.

name: Ashley
review: Color isn't as vibrant when applied and blended.  Glitter doesn't apply evenly.  Not easy to use.

name: AshleyG
review: I bought the light gold eye stick. The eye shadow was easy to apply and looked great. The glitter was harder to apply, but dried pretty quickly. I was happy with the way my eyes looked until the end of the day when I noticed the eyeshadow flaking off. I probably will not buy this product again, but I do not regret purchasing it because it would be fun to use sometimes.

name: Drea
review: This product has great color payout but I wish that the duo had the same brush on both ends. There is a liner side that's great and then a sponge side that is too fat and bulky to really do anything with.

name: rissasaorous
review: Overall the product is great - it truly is different than anything I've ever usesed. It's more of a nail polish for your eyes. The color side (I have the golden one) goes on beautifully - it also gives a nice cooling effect. Be sure you let it dry before opening your eyes completely or it will smudge! I like to do my lipstick while thats drying. As for the glitter - it was just okay. It's alot like applying glitter nail polish. You have to go over multiple times and really work wear you want the glitter to go. It smudged very easily and also comes off easily - which would be great...if it was only when you were trying to take it off. As for blending with shadows, its kind of difficult but not impossible. I just felt that it took me more product to get the desired effect of blending.

name: Beth
review: Shadow is easy to apply and the color is beautiful but after a while it started to crack and flake off. The glitter was difficult to apply evenly. I had to let it dry, apply more, let it dry, etc...... I had originally intended to buy all the colors so I will try it again, this time without a primer under it. It I don't get better results I'll be giving it away.

name: DonniPhilly
review: I like this to wear under my eyes just below the water line. The applicators that come with it are not good for precision or for getting the right amount of product where you want it. I use a brush with a tiny bush head to apply this and it works much better.  I dab a little bit of product on the back of my hand, and dip my own brush in that.  It does dry quickly this way, so I only dab enough on my hand to do one eye at a time.  The product stays put all day, and doesn't settle into the little wrinkles under my eye.  Even eye or makeup primer settles into those wrinkles, so I just wear this and it doesn't move at all throughout the day.

name: ssssdeb
review: I've seen this eye shadow in ads and it looked pretty but in reality it is way too glittery and in-your-face. I returned it.

name: The Young Professional
review: I bought this in the topaz color and cobalt. I like the idea of it, but the application is tricky for the cream because it dries quickly and doesn't go on evenly. I love the glitter liner though. It's so easy to chuck on and go.

name: Pammy
review: I like wearing the glitter alone as a eyeliner. It's easy to apply. The shadow is a little tricky to apply. It's hard to get the right amount on with out over doing it.

name: shanna
review: So perfect for a no fuss quick hot girly look or a night out! i use shadow all over lid and glitter as liner. It's SO quick to apply that i can't believe it!

name: Jenna
review: I love glitter so this is something I wear during the day and play up at night!  You really have to play with it though until you get the process of putting it on down pat.  I also watched youtube tutorials with makeup artists to see how they put it on and their tips which really helped me.  The cream dries fast and the glitter stays tacky for a while so I had to tweak my makeup routine for it.  Other than learning how it works with my eyes, I love it!  It's fun.  I bought the gold/ topaz color.

name: ttgee
review: I've tried a few different colors, but only one of them is great. the blue was the worst to apply and was very blotchy. the topaz is gorgeous! It does last all day or night, but does lift at the inner eye. Even still, I touch it up with a little more product.

name: Mari
review:
So I came across this beauty of a beauty guru on YouTube
This was not easy to apply. I know glitter in general is not easy but the flimsy brush head on this made extra hard and it also did not distrubute appropriately !

name: Unhappy mom
review: I bought this for my daughter to use for her prom.  We both put it on ahead of time to try out the look of it.  It looked fine but within 15 minutes it started to peel off both of us.

name: Cristinah
review: It's really easy to apply and the glitter side is so pretty I add one layer than wait till it dries for the second layer. If you try to add lots of the glitter at once it will dry up and and lift around the edges by the end of the day

name: Meliiissaaa
review: The glitter is easy to apply but it works better when you blend with your finger. Takes about a couple of minutes to dry but after that, it doesn't flake off. Can be hard to remove.

name: AnnaBelle the Peach
review:
The glitter end is your average glitter gel, dries nicely, stays put. I love a pop of it at the center of my lower lashline for a flashy eye look.

The cream end, however, is impossible to blend, takes forever to dry, and it's sticky as heck, you'll be carefully peeling your mobile lid away from your upper lid all night if you don't give it forever to dry. I wouldn't recommend this for casual makeup users, it's a product for a creative makeup kit or a stage/dance kit.

name: Mom to 3
review: Perfect for my daughter on stage.

name: Rayna
review: I used this product for a night out, it worked great! The only problem I had is having it dry without it getting clumpy first .

name: cindy
review: i use this product everyday. love love love the glitter. adds just a hint of surprise above my eyeliner.

name: Eve
review: I love this product I remember swatching it in stores but they would never have the colors I wanted. So glad I got this product its true to color & the glitter is perfect.

name: PD
review: I like the look on me

name: T
review: Love it

name: Diana
review: I love this product! It does not crease and it highly pigmented. Definitely a must have

name: Tip
review: It literally lasts for 24 hours and the colors come out beautiful

name: Ellie
review: Bought this on a whim and only because they were out of the actual brand i normally use for sparkly things. Turns out this much less expensive version works as well and has as much glitter and sass. Both ends can be used for an eye liner or just go over your eyeliner with the glitter. dont forget to fan it dry before u open your eyes fully or it will smudge but aside from this its pretty darn fabulous actually! A pleasant surprise!!!!!

name: Mar�ssa
review: This eyeshadow is beyond cute I absolutely love the glitter. It takes a while for the base color to dry but a little goes a long way and it stays on all day which is is great.

name: Finda
review: This is the perfect glitter for your eye! I always used loose glitter and the fallout is crazy.. with this perfect combo you get color and glitter that is so easy to apply, you will most likely have glitter eyes every day♡

name: Thatkeisergirl
review: The color pops but it only stayed on for about a hour before it flaked off. The sparkles itch and unless you put it on really thin it creases. It took like 5 minutes to fully dry.

name: kel
review: Use as a glitter eyeshadow, so easy to use and very wearable!

name: hh-96
review: This is awesome most of the bad reviews i think have to do with the aplication if u use the wand you wont get as smooth application or ad pigmented or into a specific area but applys flawlessly with a concealer brush

name: I Love Colors
review:
I've bought this in multiple colors and I love it. But if you don't take a little extra care, this is prone to flaking. I use a primer and a little black shadow to make the colors pop, and I make sure to let the creme shadow fully dry with my eyes closed.

If I apply it without a base or without letting it dry, then it starts cracking within two or three hours. When I apply after primer and powder base, it lasts until I take it off. I've gone more than twelve hours of perfect wear, and it doesn't require touching up if you apply it properly the first time around. The glitter liner makes for a great pop of color--again, let it dry!--and I like being able to use it over powdered shadows.

name: Jess
review: Love this, it last all day. Just make sure you allow it to dry after applying.

name: Dawn
review: Color is very bold and doesn't blend out at the edges.

name: JJ Taylor
review: I love using this product with light shades of pink and nudes. It looks beautiful when applied and is easy to work with.

name: mymom51
review: This is interesting to say the least. I have it in all the colors. I use the cream on the eyelid proper and only use the glitter as eye liner. I let it dry and then I use a powder on the brow and crease then i blend for a more natural look. It lasts all day  and does not flake unless you apply it too thick.

name: Ali
review: Recommend it

name: mymom51
review: I'm 64 and still found this quite amusing. I only use the creme shadow on the eyelid proper. Let it dry, add powdered shadow on the upper eyelid and also the crease. blend all three well. Last I use the glitter as an eyeliner. I use it conservatively and it lasts all day. Some people use the glitter all over but I think it ends up peeling when you use it too thickly. The colors are great and as I said, it lasts all day.

name: Ashley
review: I am in love with this eye shadow! I bought it last week and so far have used it everyday. I can use just the base for work and then I put the glitter over after when I was going out to a rock concert that same night. I also used it for halloween and it was perfect. It does not crease or smudge and lasts all day. I like to use a darker blending shade from my naked 2 pallette in my crease and then I apply the base coat to lid and while still wet, blend out with finger. Then you have the option to use just the base or add the glitter coat on top!

name: Jo
review: The glitter side works ok but the shadow side takes too long to dry and it doesn't stay for very long. Seems like you have to apply a lot.
